page.title: 10JACKLETTS FARM
page.content:
JACKLETTS FARM - DANBURY Jackletts Farm dates back many years and a visit will reveal many fine architectural features. Below is a transcript of the original documentation concerning the farm:
"parcels of the possessions of George Golding Esquire, in the parishes of Danbury, Purley, Woodham Ferris hall, and Stow, in the County aforesaid, called Jackletts, viewed and measured by Edward Worsopp of London gent. the fourth day of September; and in the XXVI year of the reign of our Sovereign Lady Elizabeth, by the grace of God, Queen of England, France, and Ireland defender of the faith...."
